If you have a message board/forum for EverQuest, and would like to see it listed, please send me an e-mail.  It would help if you would also provide me with a description identifying what it relates to within the game (general, guilds, etc.).

General Discussion Board
General discussions relating to the game. 

Guild Announcements
A board dedicated to guilds for announcing their assembly, activities, recruiting, or for those wishing to join that would like feedback outside of standard e-mail.

Role-playing Board
This board is strictly for role-playing (in character) discussions and stories.

Message boards hosted by EverQuest
This is the official series of boards hosted by EverQuest.  While I haven't seen developers post here, the current SOE (Sony Online Entertainment) moderators do what they can to answer questions.

General board (hosted by EQVault)

Developers board (hosted by EQVault)

EverQuest Gamers Forum
A whole series of message boards, four per server, so players can interact with others on the servers they play.  Additionally, four similar boards are available for global use.
